item.title: German Broadcaster Backs Berlusconi’s Takeover Bid
item.description: ProSiebenSat.1 has formally endorsed a new, improved takeover bid by Pier Silvio Berlusconi’s MFE group, which would merge the German broadcaster with MFE’s Italian network Mediaset and Spain’s Teleci

item.title: German Broadcaster Backs Berlusconi’s Takeover Bid
item.description: ProSiebenSat.1 has formally endorsed a new, improved takeover bid by Pier Silvio Berlusconi’s MFE group, which would merge the German broadcaster with MFE’s Italian network Mediaset and Spain’s Teleci

item.title: Berlusconi’s MFE Ups Takeover Offer for Germany’s ProSiebenSat.1
item.description: MFE wants to add Germany’s number 2 commercial broadcaster to its pan-European network that already includes Italy’s Mediaset and Spain’s Telecinco.

item.title: Berlusconi’s MFE Ups Takeover Offer for Germany’s ProSiebenSat.1
item.description: MFE wants to add Germany’s number 2 commercial broadcaster to its pan-European network that already includes Italy’s Mediaset and Spain’s Telecinco.
